ComicInfo.Summary:
Inside the maze of caves, the hikers attempt to locate Debbie without attracting the attention of the predators. Meanwhile, Debbie manages to escape her bonds and looks for a way out. The group is ready to make their last stand and only one side is going to make it out alive.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Riveiro & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | C | Cover C | Derlis Santacruz & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Allan Otero & Grostieta | 4 | E | Subscription Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Riveiro | Missing | Note: The digital edition (7/18/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 18:21:53. [CVDB677377]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allan Otero, Ceci de la Cruz, David Lorenzo Riveiro, Derlis Santacruz, Harvey Tolibao, Ivan Nunes, Ulises Grostieta, Urszula Mos
